pages.title: Server Rack
pages.text: The heavy lifter of the LogiCore network. While the $(l:logicore:machines/computer)Computer$() is suitable for small tasks, the Server Rack is designed for high-density parallel processing, generating significantly more $(l:logicore:architecture/cycles)Cycles$() per tick.

pages.title: Configuration
pages.text: To operate, the rack requires a $(l:logicore:components/processor_unit)Processor Unit$() installed in its bay and a connection to the network via $(l:logicore:components/data_cable)Data Cable$().$(br)$(br)Due to its high throughput, ensure your power generation can sustain its energy demands.

pages.title: Redstone Control
pages.text: Like other LogiCore machines, the Server Rack is $(l)redstone Sensitive$().$(br)$(br)Applying a steady Redstone signal will trigger a hardware interrupt. This pauses all calculation threads, stopping $(l:logicore:architecture/cycles)Cycle$() production and cutting power draw to zeroâ€”ideal for demand-based automation.
